data.title: Getting Started with SiteGround
data.meta_description: This tutorial is designed to give you an overview of a SiteGround hosting account, help you configure your website and use the tools we’ve created for you
data.text:
This tutorial is designed to give you an overview of a SiteGround hosting account, help you configure your website and use the tools we’ve created in the best possible way. If you haven’t already signed up for a SiteGround account, simply choose a hosting plan and follow the steps.

Set Up Your Website

Select a Domain for Your Site

Start a New Site

Transfer an Existing Site

Add an SSL to Your Site

Manage Your Domains

Verify a New Domain Registration

Point a Domain to SiteGround

Transfer Domains to SiteGround

Manage Your Domain Registrant’s Information

Manage Domain Name Servers

Add Additional Domains To Your Site

Change Your Site’s Domain Name

Manage Emails

Create Email Accounts

Transfer Emails from your Previous Host

Set Up Email on Your Phone

Set Up Email on a Computer

Master the SiteGround Tools

SiteGround SuperCacher

Backup Creation & Restoration

Git Tool

Get Support
